## Timezone and Network time protocol ## 

| Command                            | Description                          |
|------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| `timedatectl`                      | Get the system setup                 |
| `timedatectl list-timezones`       | List the avalaible times zones       |
| `timedatectl set-timezone <zone> ` | set and sync with the given timezone |
| `timedatectl set-ntp true`         | allow network sync                   |
